summary: God is getting tired. So he looks for a saint to take his place for a while.
cast: Antônio Fagundes|Wagner Moura|Paloma Duarte|Bruce Gomlevsky|Stepan Nercessian|Castrinho|Hugo Carvana|Chico Assis|Thiago Farias|Susana Werner|Toni Garrido|Ivana Iza|Vitor Diegues Meuren
title: Deus é Brasileiro
